name: confirmed-private-transfer-error
description: Error response for the ConfirmedPrivateTransfer service, indicating a failure in a vendor-specific service.

fields.name: error-type
fields.description: The error class and code describing the failure.

fields.name: service-number
fields.description: The vendor-specific service number that failed.
